item.title: Terms of Use
item.description:
Welcome to ArabicEG.com. By accessing or using our website, app, or any related services ("Services"), you agree to these Terms of Use. Please read them carefully before continuing.

1. Purpose of Our Services 🎯

ArabicEG aims to empower expats, language learners, and travelers to communicate confidently in practical, everyday spoken Saudi (Khaleeji) Arabic. We provide a library of real-life phrases, pronunciation guides, and translations designed for daily use and cultural understanding.

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description:
Welcome to ArabicEG.com. Your privacy is important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our website, app, or related services ("Services").

1. Information We Collect 📝
  • Personal Data: We do not require or collect any personally identifiable information (PII) such as your name, email address, or phone number for basic usage of our Services.
  • Usage Data: We may collect non-identifiable information about how you interact with our Services. This includes things like your language preferences, which phrases you mark as favorites, your device type, and the time you spend on the site. This data is primarily used for personalization and is stored locally in your browser.
  • Cookies & Local Storage: We use cookies and browser local storage to save your preferences, such as your selected language and any phrases you have favorited. This helps us to improve your experience without needing to store your data on our servers.
2. How We Use Your Data 🔄
  • To personalize your experience, remembering your preferences such as your selected language and favorited content.
  • To improve our Services, analyze usage patterns, and fix bugs.
  • We do NOT sell, rent, or share your personal data with third parties. All usage data collected is anonymous and used solely to enhance the user experience.
3. Data Security 🛡️

We take reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your data against unauthorized access, alteration, or destruction. Since we do not collect personal identifiers, the risk of a data breach involving personal information is minimal.
